biotools.summary: Génie evaluates the literature attached to all genes in a genome and to their orthologs for a selected topic. Hundreds of species and millions of genes are supported. Running times range from a few seconds to a minute in most of the cases.

bioschemas.name: Genie
bioschemas.summary: Génie evaluates the literature attached to all genes in a genome and to their orthologs for a selected topic. Hundreds of species and millions of genes are supported. Running times range from a few seconds to a minute in most of the cases.
